title: Double Happy!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Happy new year, Dia-san. And also happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Happy new year, Hanamaru-san. Thank you for the kind wishes. I’m happy to receive them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Today is new years and also your birthday, so it’s a double happy day zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I’m honored to be a part of that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>The anniversary of someone important to you is always a good day! With that said, Maru has been thinking of a way to make today even happier....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Even happier, you say?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Let’s do a new year visit to the shrine and pull a great blessing for our fortune! Then today can become a triple happy day zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I don’t think you could aim for good fortune....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>That’s not true! Maru just knows zura....! You’ll definitely pull a great blessing! The rest of Aqours is waiting outside, so let’s hurry up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh, everyone is outside? Then let’s get going! I’ll try to get that great blessing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
